name: 2016 International Conference on Environmental Engineering and Sustainable Development
content: Publishing and Indexing: All the accepted papers will be included in the conference proceeding, which will be published in the volume of IOP Conference Series: Earth and Environmental Science (ISSN: 1755-1307), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex,SCOPUS, Inspec, Conference Proceedings Citation Index â€“ Science (CPCI-S)(Thomson Reuters, Web of Science), NASA Astrophysics Data System,and other databases. Please kindly notice that authors are assumed to accept the terms of the Proceedings Publication License, if an article is submitted for publication in this series. Speakers: Prof. Irene Man Chi Lo, The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Hong Kong Prof. Du Ruxu, The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong Prof. Hsin Chu, National Cheng Kung University, Taiwan Prof. J. Paul Chen, National University of Singapore (NUS), Singapore Prof. M L Kansal, Indian Institute of Technology-Roorkee,India
